src:
Morilska noč čarovnic
Na zabavi v Kaliforniji so umrli štirje mladi ljudje. Dan pred tem so na dvorišču hiše našli tri trupla.
03 Nov 2019, 07:39 by A. J.
ORINDA/LONDON – Noč čarovnic simbolično velja za najbolj strašno noč v letu, a večinoma so grozljive podobe, pripovedi in dogodki le del prazničnega rituala. Naravnost srhljivo noč čarovnic so zabeležili v Kaliforniji, v okrožju Orinda. Na zabavi, ki so se je udeležili pretežno mladi, študentje fakultete Laney College, so odjeknili streli, v katerih so življenje izgubili štirje ljudje, več pa je bilo ranjenih. Množično streljanje se je zgodilo na posestvu, najetem prek portala airbnb. Vabilom na instagramu in letakih se je odzvalo okoli 100 ljudi. Le dan pred streljanjem na zabavi v okrožju Orinda se je v Kaliforniji s streljanjem ter s smrtjo treh in z devetimi ranjenimi končala še ena zabava za noč čarovnic. Umrli so trije moški, stari nad dvajset let, njihova trupla so našli na zadnjem dvorišču hiše, v kateri je potekalo dogajanje. Pet žrtev, ki so bile hudo ranjene, so odpeljali v bolnišnico.Tudi za Londončana, starega nad 20 let, je praznična groza postala resničnost. V času kosila so ga sredi belega dne na eni od londonskih ulic zabodli. Reševalci, ki so okoli enih prihiteli v Enfield, kjer se je napad zgodil, so žrtev nemudoma odpeljali v bolnišnico, vendar so bile poškodbe prehude, da bi ga lahko rešili. Dobri dve uri po tem, ko so ga naložili v rešilca, je nekaj pred pol tretjo uro popoldne umrl. Policisti, ki primer še preiskujejo, so se včeraj po pomoč pri iskanju morilca obrnili na javnost. To pa ni bila edina žrtev napada z nožem v britanski prestolnici tisti dan. Na drugem koncu Londona, v ulici Henderson, so okoli pol desetih zvečer večkrat zabodli moškega. Tudi drugo žrtev so prepeljali v bolnišnico, preiskava primera pa še poteka.
text:
Halloween killer
Four young people died at a party in California. The day before, three dead bodies were found in the yard of the house.
03 Nov 2019, 07:39 by A.J.
ORINDA / LONDON - Halloween is symbolically considered the scariest night of the year, but for the most part, horrifying images, narratives and events are only part of the holiday ritual. Natural Halloween is recorded in California, Orinda County. At a party attended by predominantly young, Laney College students, shots were fired in which four people were killed and more were injured. The mass shooting happened on an estate rented through the airbnb portal. About 100 people responded to instagram and flyer invitations. Just the day before the Orinda County shooting in California, another Halloween party ended with the shooting and the deaths of three and nine wounded. Three men over the age of twenty died and their bodies were found in the back yard of the house where the incident took place. Five victims, seriously injured, were taken to hospital. Even for a Londoner over 20, the festive horror has become a reality. He was stabbed in the middle of a white day in one of London's streets. Rescuers who arrived in Enfield, where the attack happened, took the victim to the hospital immediately, but the injuries were too soon to save him. About two hours after he was loaded into the ambulance, he died shortly before 3:30 in the afternoon. Police officers still investigating the case turned to the public yesterday for help finding the killer. This was not the only victim of a knife attack in the British capital that day. On the other end of London, Henderson Street, a man was stabbed several times in the evening at about ten in the evening. The other victim was also transported to the hospital, and the case is still under investigation.
